titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Rice University memorabilia collection, 1912-2022 UA 225
titlestmt.author: Lee Pecht, student John Marks, volunteers Mary Tobin & Cornelia Williams

publicationstmt.publisher: Woodson Research Center, Rice University, Houston, Texas

note.p: Stored onsite at the Woodson Research Center.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2024-02-07 12:50:48 -0600.

did.head: Collection Summary

repository.corpname: Woodson Research Center, Rice University, Houston, Texas

did.abstract: This collection contains a wide variety of realia from Rice University's history, including a variety of jewelry pieces, clothing, athletics-related materials, and various other objects.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Rice University was founded in 1891 and opened in 1912. The memorabilia in this collection reflects many aspects of the university's history, from social life, academic life, athletics, administration, architectural elements, symbols such as the seal and shield.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection contains a wide variety of realia from Rice University's history, including a variety of jewelry pieces, clothing, athletics-related materials, and various other objects.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: This material is available for research.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Stored onsite at the Woodson Research Center.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The items in this collection were transferred from other university departments or donated by Rice alumni throughout the years.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Rice University Memorabilia Collection, UA 225, Woodson Research Center, Fondren Library, Rice University.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish from this collection must be obtained from Woodson Research Center, Fondren Library, Rice University.
